sentences.en: A duck will not always dabble in the same gutter.
sentences.cn: 一只鸭子不会常在同一条沟中玩水.

sentences.en: Better far to do one thing pre - eminently well than to dabble in forty.
sentences.cn: 将一件事做到极致远远强于将四十件事作为兴趣浅尝辄止.

sentences.en: Children like to dabble in water.
Dabble: To splash liquid gently and playfully.
sentences.cn: 嬉水: 轻柔嬉耍地泼溅液体.

sentences.en: He dabble in stocks and shares for a few months and then gave them up.
sentences.cn: 他做过几个月的股票买卖,但很快就放弃了.

sentences.en: He well - reads, dabble 100 divisions, made graven contribution to abounding scientific thesaurus of the mankind.
sentences.cn: 他博览群书, 涉猎百科, 对丰富人类的科学知识宝库做出了不可磨灭的贡献.

sentences.en: I'd like to go dabble in ( at ) politics.
sentences.cn: 我愿意 涉足 政治.

sentences.en: Magicians do not dabble, they work hard.
sentences.cn: 魔术师可不是随便玩两下的，他们下了苦功钻研。

sentences.en: Never dabble with things of which you have no knowledge.
sentences.cn: 绝不要插手你不了解的事物.

sentences.en: They dabble with the Wyrm too much.
sentences.cn: 他们被妖蛆窜改的太多了.

sentences.en: Winston Churchill liked to dabble in landscape painting.
sentences.cn: 邱吉尔喜欢涉猎风景画.

sentences.en: You dabble in and out of different flavours.
sentences.cn: 你能够在不同的口味中徜徉.

trans.tran_cn: 弄湿, 弄水, 涉足
trans.tran_en: If you dabble in something, you take part in it but not very seriously

trans.tran_cn: 玩水，嬉水，弄湿，溅湿，蘸，涉猎
